glsa.title: QtGui: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A use-after-free was discovered in QtGui's Markdown handling code possibly allowing a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: QtGui is a module for the Qt toolkit.

description.p: QtGuiâ€™s setMarkdown has a use-after-free related to QTextMarkdownImporter::insertBlock.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All QtGui users should upgrade to the latest version:
Note that the Qt suite is best kept in sync, so a world upgrade may be advisable to keep your system in a good state.
